section.p: The ship is swept far out to sea. Men and goods are washed overboard by crashing, ink-dark waves that snap your hawsers like twine.
Lose 1 Cargo Unit (if you have any cargo) and reduce your crew quality by one step - i.e. an excellent crew becomes good, a good crew becomes average, and an average crew becomes poor.
At last the storm blows itself out. You are left drifting in unknown waters.
